audioText: Demain, tu regarderas ma tête pour voir si j'ai bien dormi cette nuit.
question: What will the person look at tomorrow?
options: The speaker's head to see if they slept well
explanation: The text says 'tu regarderas ma tête pour voir si j'ai bien dormi' - you will look at my head to see if I slept well. 'Regarderas' is the future tense of 'regarder' (to look), and 'tête' means head.
